channel.title: CVE Feed for Jenkins project -- Jenkins Walti Plugin
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Jenkins project -- Jenkins Walti Plugin

item.title: CVE-2022-41240|2024-08-03T12:35:49.691Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20walti%20plugin
item.description: Jenkins Walti Plugin 1.0.1 and earlier does not escape the information provided by the Walti API, resulting in a stored cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerability exploitable by attackers able to provide malicious API responses from Walti.
